pages.title: Elder Guardian
pages.text: Level: <level_t4>$(br2)Spawns in $(copy:Ocean Monument)Ocean Monument$()[$(copy:betteroceanmonuments:ocean_monument)betteroceanmonuments:ocean_monument$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Mana Locate$().$(br2)Defeating $(key)Elder Guardian$() drops $(key)Abyss Guard$(), which can be used to summon $(boss/t3/captain)Captain Cornelia$().
